alert.note: Alert for Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 09 at 10:58AM CDT until May 09 at 11:30AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southern Rooks County in north central Kansas... * Until 1130 AM CDT. * At 1058 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Zurich, or 20 miles east of Hill City, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Zurich around 1105 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this tornadic thunderstorm include Plainville and Codell. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
